title: Minor Kha'Zix description  issue
body: In the description of Kha'Zix's abilities, it doesn't describe what isolation is. Minor issue, could possibly go in his passive description. What units to nearest champ/tower etc despite the isolation marker being near the champ in game gives you.

replies.body:
This is the **in-game **description of {{champion:121}}'s Unseen Threat: 
> When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

This is the **LoLWiki** description of {{champion:121}}'s Unseen Threat:
> Isolation: Kha'Zix marks all nearby enemies who aren't accompanied by any of their allies nearby as Isolated. Kha'Zix's abilities have special interactions against Isolated targets.
> 
> Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat when the enemy team loses sight of him, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 10 - 146 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.

So yeah, all Riot needs is copy-paste the missing description for Isolation onto Unseen Threat like LoLWiki does. Thanks for the reminder.

You could also try and duplicate this OP to NA board to gain higher visibility to Riot staffs, as that's their HQ.
